content.text: is designed to aggregate and present billing data from the

table. It provides a summarized view of meter billing usage, distinguishing between original bills and adjustment bills. The view uses a combination of aggregation functions and conditional logic to compute various metrics such as total consumption, demand, and counts of time-of-day accounts. It also categorizes the data into two distinct groups based on whether the billing period has been revised or not.
